document_data.name: Shou Lung Amethyst
document_data.mainbody: '''Shou Lung amethyst''' was a [[wikipedia:en:corundum|corundum]] mineral more similar to [[ruby]] and [[sapphire]] than to the [[amethyst]]s found in [[Faer√ªn]]. [[Kara-Tur]] was believed to be the source for these [[gem stones]], where their properties were said to protect the nobility.
document_data.Description: The deep purple amethyst-like hue gave [[Shou Lung]] amethyst its name.
document_data.Powers: These stones were rumored to have strong magical powers, but none have been documented.
document_data.Reputation: The Shou Lung amethysts, or oriental amethysts, were considered prized gems among the [[drow]] and were their favorites. So much so that the majority of their city had the know-how to competently work them.
